Package com.imaginea.mongodb.common.exceptions

Interface Summary
ErrorCodes Defines Error Codes for Exceptions thrown in MongoDb while performing operations in Services Files.
 

Exception Summary
CollectionException Defines all the Exceptions generated while performing any operation on Collections in MongoDb.
DatabaseException Defines all the Exceptions generated while performing any operation on Databases in MongoDb.
DeleteCollectionException Defines Exception generated while performing delete operation on a collection.
DeleteDatabaseException Defines Exception generated while performing delete operation on a Database.
DeleteDocumentException Defines Exception generated while performing delete operation on a document.
DocumentException Defines all the Exceptions generated while performing any operation on Documents in MongoDb.
DuplicateCollectionException Defines Exception generated when a User tries to insert a Duplicate collection which is not permitted.
DuplicateDatabaseException Defines Exception generated when a User tries to insert a Duplicate Database which is not permitted.
EmptyCollectionNameException Defines exception generated while checking for valid collection name to be inserted in Mongo Db.
EmptyDatabaseNameException Defiens exception generated while checking for valid database name to be inserted in Mongo Db.
EmptyDocumentDataException Defiens exception generated while checking for valid document data to be inserted in Mongo Db.
InsertCollectionException Defines Exception generated while performing insert operation on a collection.
InsertDatabaseException Defines Exception generated while performing insert operation on a Database.
InsertDocumentException Defines Exception generated while performing insert operation on a document.
InvalidHTTPRequestException Defines an Exception thrown when the HTTP Request made is invalid.
MongoHostUnknownException Defines Exception generated when Mongo Host is not found.
UndefinedCollectionException Defines Exception generated when a user tries to access a collection that does not exist.
UndefinedDatabaseException Defines Exception generated when a user tries to access a database that does not exist.
UndefinedDocumentException Defines Exception generated when a user tries to access a document that does not exist.
UndefinedServletConfigException Defines Exception generated when servlet config is not set and user tries to extract mongo config parameters from the servlet config.
UpdateDocumentException Defines Exception generated while performing update operation on a document.
ValidationException A Validation Exception class that inherits all properties of Exception and defines exception generates when invalid data is provided like empty database name, empty collection name or no document data.
